mutants.code:
def find_max_number(n):
    num_str = str(n)
    sorted_digits = sorted(num_str, reverse=False)
    max_num = int(''.join(sorted_digits))
    return max_num

def find_max_number(n):
    num_str = str(n)
    sorted_digits = sorted(num_str, reverse=True)
    max_num = int('MUTATED'.join(sorted_digits))
    return max_num
